revised_title: Algebraic and Transcendental Aspects of Elliptic Function Transformations
tldr: The author presents an algebraic approach to the transformation of elliptic functions, building upon Jacobi's work in the 'Fundamenta Nova'. The study involves the use of modular equations and differential equations, with a focus on odd numbers and prime values. The author also discusses the cases of cubic and quintic transformations, providing a deeper understanding of the underlying mathematical concepts.
